text: Leonardo is one of the four Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. He is the leader of the team of brothers and uses a sword. He is named after Leonardo da Vinci. ==Portrayals== Leonardo has been played by James Arnold Taylor and Johnny Knoxville in movies based on TMNT. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1984 Category:Fictional turtles Category:Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles characters
title: Leonardo (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles)
